All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
GameController
The GameController interacts with the view to place ships, initialize the player's fleet, and handle tooltips to enhance the user experience.
GameModel
The GameModel class represents the core data structure and state management for the Naval Battle game.
GameModelInterface
Interface that defines the core methods for managing the game state and persistence in the Naval Battle game.
GamePersistenceInterface
Interface defining the structure for game persistence operations, specifically for managing and maintaining the state of matches in the "Battleship" game.
GamePersistenceModel
Handles the persistence of the game state for a single match in the Battleship game.
GameView
Represents the main game window (view) for the Naval Battle game.
GameView.GameViewHolder
Holds the single instance of GameView, following the Singleton pattern.
HelloApplication
 
HelloController
Controller class for the initial screen of the Naval Battle game.
HelloView
 
HelloView.HelloViewHolder
Holds the single instance of GameView, following the Singleton pattern.
MainTable
The MainTable class represents the machine's game board in a battleship game.
MainTableInterface
Interface representing the machine's game board in the Battleship game.
MatchStatusSerializable
Represents the status of a match in the Battleship game, containing the boards for both the player and the machine.
MatchStatusSerializableInterface
Interface representing the status of a match in the Battleship game.
PositionTable
The PositionTable class represents the player's table where all ships are placed.
PositionTableInterface
Interface representing a player's position table in the Naval Battle game.
Ship
The Ship class represents a ship used in the Naval Battle game.
ShipDrawer
The ShipDrawer class provides implementations for drawing various types of ships used in the Battleship game.
ShipDrawerInterface
Interface defining the structure for drawing different types of ships and basic shapes used in the Battleship game.
ShipInterface
